4.text:
4. A gardener is planting bulbs in a garden. 

(a) The gardener has 5 packets of tulip bulbs. Each packet contains 8 bulbs. Calculate the total number of tulip bulbs the gardener has.

(b) In addition to the tulip bulbs, the gardener also plants 12 daffodil bulbs. What is the total number of bulbs planted by the gardener?

(c) The gardener plants the bulbs in rows. Each row contains 10 bulbs. Calculate how many complete rows of bulbs the gardener can plant with the total number of bulbs. 

(d) After planting the complete rows, how many bulbs are left unplanted?
